meanings.definition: Abnormal outward deviation of a bone or joint
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a valgus in his knee.
meanings.sent2: The valgus in her ankle caused her to walk with a limp.
meanings.sent3: The valgus in the skeleton model made it look like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: The tree branch grew in a valgus, reaching towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The valgus in the road caused many accidents due to the sharp turn.

meanings.definition: Having a deformity characterized by outward deviation of a bone or joint
meanings.sent1: She wore special shoes to support her valgus foot.
meanings.sent2: The valgus knee brace helped him walk more comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The valgus angle of the building made it stand out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent4: Her valgus fingers made it difficult for her to hold small objects.
meanings.sent5: The valgus shape of the sculpture gave it a unique and striking appearance.
